```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
```

## CSV import

```{r}
netflix_originals <- read_excel("../datasets/netflix_originals.xlsx")

netflix_originals
```

```{r}
netflix_originals <- transmute(netflix_originals, 
                                Title = Title,
                                Genre = Genre,
                                Premiere = Premiere,
                                Seasons = Seasons,
                                Min_Time = ifelse(!is.na(str_match(Runtime, "([0-9]+)-([0-9]+)")[,2]),
                                                  str_match(Runtime, "([0-9]+)-([0-9]+)")[,2],
                                                  str_match(Runtime, "([0-9]+)")[,2]),
                                Max_Time = ifelse(!is.na(str_match(Runtime, "([0-9]+)-([0-9]+)")[,3]),
                                                  str_match(Runtime, "([0-9]+)-([0-9]+)")[,3],
                                                  str_match(Runtime, "([0-9]+)")[,2]),
                                Status = Status
                               )
netflix_originals

unique(select(netflix_originals, Status))
```

```{r}
string <- "23 min."

!is.na(str_match(string, "([0-9]+)-([0-9]+)")[,3])
str_match(string, "([0-9]+)")[,2]

matcher <- str_match(string, "([0-9]+)")
matcher
```
